quote: Many roads lead to the path, but basically there are only two: reason and practice.  – Bodhidharma
fact: The name for Oz in the "Wizard of Oz" was thought up when the creator, Frank Baum, looked at his filing cabinet and saw A-N, and O-Z; hence the name "OZ."
joke: Why did the half blind man fall in the well? Because he couldn't see that well!
